plot: Washed out to sea, a resourceful castaway finds refuge on a "dessert-ed" island abundant in mystical fruit. Is he saved from solitude or does he find peace in paradise?
title: Coconut
plot_es: Washed out to sea, a resourceful castaway finds refuge on a "dessert-ed" island abundant in mystical fruit. Is he saved from solitude or does he find peace in paradise?
plot_en: Washed out to sea, a resourceful castaway finds refuge on a "dessert-ed" island abundant in mystical fruit. Is he saved from solitude or does he find peace in paradise?
